summary: Fleeing a murder charge, a busboy and a nightclub singer wind up on a spooky Caribbean island inherited by a young woman.
cast: Dean Martin|Jerry Lewis|Lizabeth Scott|Carmen Miranda|George Dolenz|Dorothy Malone|William Ching|Paul Marion|Jack Lambert|Tony Barr|Leonard Strong|Henry Brandon|Hugh Sanders|Fred Aldrich|Danny Arnold|Gertrude Astor|Frank Branda|Chester Clute|Tom Coleman|Bing Crosby|Billy Daniel|Jimmie Dundee|Charles Evans|Franklyn Farnum|Jesslyn Fax|Bess Flowers|Charles Flynn|Frank Fontaine|Herb Golden|Herschel Graham|Joe Gray|Sam Harris|Percy Helton|Earl Holliman|Bob Hope|Richard Karlan|Kenner G. Kemp|Lyle Latell|Nolan Leary|Jack Low|Wilbur Mack|Alphonse Martell|Thomas Martin|David O. McCall|Frank McLure|Harold Miller|Belle Mitchell|Robin Morse|Jane Novak|Manuel París|Murray Pollack|Jose Portugal|Tom Powers|Waclaw Rekwart|Suzanne Ridgway|Ric Roman|Cosmo Sardo|Ernö Verebes|Dick Winslow
title: Una herencia de miedo
